properties.name: breadcrumb
properties.description: The breadcrumb of the node, displaying the "path", but supports multiple levels. e.g. (Groups > Level 1 > Level 2)
properties.rawdescription:
The breadcrumb of the node, displaying the "path", but supports multiple levels.
e.g. (Groups > Level 1 > Level 2)

properties.name: confirm
properties.description: Confirmation popover displayed at the end of the process of moving the navigator menu item.
properties.rawdescription: Confirmation popover displayed at the end of the process of moving the navigator menu item.

properties.name: draggable
properties.description: Indicates that the navigator node is draggable.
properties.rawdescription: Indicates that the navigator node is draggable.

properties.name: dragged
properties.description: Indicates that the navigator node is dragged.
properties.rawdescription: Indicates that the navigator node is dragged.

properties.name: draggedHover
properties.description: Indicates that currently something is dragged over the node.
properties.rawdescription: Indicates that currently something is dragged over the node.

properties.name: featureId
properties.rawdescription: Id to identify specific feature node.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: Indicates that the navigator node is visible/hidden.
properties.rawdescription: Indicates that the navigator node is visible/hidden.

properties.name: injector
properties.description: Used to load the providers for the components. If not provided, default injector us used.
properties.rawdescription: Used to load the providers for the components. If not provided, default injector us used.

properties.name: open
properties.description: Indicates that the navigator node is expanded/collapsed.
properties.rawdescription: Indicates that the navigator node is expanded/collapsed.

properties.name: path
properties.description: The path to which the UI will be redirected after clicking the navigator node.
properties.rawdescription: The path to which the UI will be redirected after clicking the navigator node.

properties.name: routerLinkExact
properties.description:
Indicates whether the navigator node should be active based on matching the node path and the URL path. To match the URL exactly, set this option to true.

routerLinkExact set to true: When the URL path is set to /a/b/c and the node path to /a/b then the node will not be set active.

routerLinkExact set to false: When the URL path is set to /a/b/c and the node path to /a/b then the node will be set active.
properties.rawdescription:
Indicates whether the navigator node should be active based on matching the node path and the URL path.
To match the URL exactly, set this option to true.

routerLinkExact set to true:
When the URL path is set to /a/b/c and the node path to /a/b then the node will not be set active.

routerLinkExact set to false:
When the URL path is set to /a/b/c and the node path to /a/b then the node will be set active.

properties.name: translateLabel
properties.description: Whether to pass label through translate pipe when being displayed.
properties.rawdescription: Whether to pass `label` through `translate` pipe when being displayed.

methods.name: add
methods.rawdescription: Adds a child navigator node to the node.
methods.description: Adds a child navigator node to the node.

methods.name: countChildren
methods.rawdescription: Counts the amount of children nodes.

methods.name: dragEnd
methods.rawdescription: This event is fired when a drag operation has ended.
methods.description: This event is fired when a drag operation has ended.

methods.name: dragEnter
methods.rawdescription: This event is fired when a dragged element enters a valid drop target.
methods.description: This event is fired when a dragged element enters a valid drop target.

methods.name: dragLeave
methods.rawdescription: This event is fired when a dragged element leaves a valid drop target.
methods.description: This event is fired when a dragged element leaves a valid drop target.

methods.name: dragStart
methods.rawdescription: This event is fired when the user starts dragging an element.
methods.description: This event is fired when the user starts dragging an element.

methods.name: drop
methods.rawdescription: This event is fired when an element is dropped on a valid drop target.
methods.description: This event is fired when an element is dropped on a valid drop target.

methods.name: expand
methods.rawdescription: Expands the navigator node if it is collapsed.
methods.description: Expands the navigator node if it is collapsed.

methods.name: find
methods.description:
Returns a child navigator node based on the predicate.

Example :
// The function will compare the labels to the string and return a matching result.
// The capitalization of the characters does not matter (case insensitive).
const predicate = 'group1';
const childNode = parentNode.find(predicate);
// Check: [lodash matches](https://lodash.com/docs/4.17.15#matches)
const predicate = { label: 'group2' };
const childNode = parentNode.find(predicate);

methods.name: remove
methods.rawdescription: Removes the child navigator node from the node.
methods.description: Removes the child navigator node from the node.

methods.name: sort
methods.rawdescription:
Sorts the children of the navigator node, by priority and name (ASC).
The higher the priority, the higher the position in the hierarchy.
For the same priority values, the alphabetical order will take precedence.
methods.description: Sorts the children of the navigator node, by priority and name (ASC). The higher the priority, the higher the position in the hierarchy. For the same priority values, the alphabetical order will take precedence.

methods.name: traverse
methods.description:
Performs a callback function recursively on each of the navigator node's children down the hierarchy.

Example :
const expandChild = (childNode) => childNode.expand();
parentNode.traverse(expandChild);

methods.name: updateChildren
methods.rawdescription: Updates the navigator node by sorting its children and also checking their visibility.
methods.description: Updates the navigator node by sorting its children and also checking their visibility.

methods.name: updateHidden
methods.rawdescription: Checks if the navigator node should be hidden based on the visibility of its child nodes.
methods.description: Checks if the navigator node should be hidden based on the visibility of its child nodes.
